Subject: Content Aware Policy Blocking
Description:
Hello Team

We are working on a policy that would report if somebody uploads files to a specific Sharepoint. We have our policy set to report only, however the Sharepoint website is getting blocked entirely by EPP. We are using DPI so not sure if is causing the issues. Thank you!
What_We_Know__c:
6/2/2025

- Sent customer follow up email

5/27/2025

- Sent customer second follow up email.

5/22/2025

- Sent customer ideas template to submit idea to Netwrix

4/11/2025

- Joined remote session

- Customer reports that CAD files not appearing in reports when uploading to SharePoint.

- DPI not enabled / Customer wishes not not use DPI

- Policy does not report only

- Created a test policy for a test computer and put a policy denylist for sharepoint, with DPI sharepoint gets blocked yet DPI not enabled sharepoint does not get blocked.

- Customer requests a feature request to add sharepoint as an exit point. 

- Requested customer open a feature request ticket to add sharepoint on endpoint to monitor list


4/10/2025

- Customer requesting remote session to look into the issue he is having with testing sharepoint transfers with our other searches and reports that it doesn't seem like it is detecting at all. 

- Sent customer requesting to join remote session at 12 PM PST/2 PM CST


4/7/2025

-Sent customer email confirming the limitations of the EPP software to block all or nothing sites from the denylist

- Sent follow up email to customer
3/27/25

- Customer was attempting to use a policy that contained a sharepoint URL in deny list. 
- Customer thought since policy was set to report only that URL would report if users attempted to visit site not block site
- Remote session held towards enabling EPP to attempt to track users attempts by removing URL from deny list and placing URL under URL categories
- Customer was unsuccessful in receiving CAP reports from attempts to upload files to sharepoint.
- Customer in the process of testing URL categories to see if policy issues a report when attempts to upload content is made.
Solution_Comment__c:
- Created a test policy for a test computer and put a policy denylist for sharepoint, with DPI sharepoint gets blocked yet DPI not enabled sharepoint does not get blocked.

- Customer requests a feature request to add sharepoint as an exit point. 

- Requested customer open a feature request ticket to add sharepoint on endpoint to monitor list
